name: ABDOMINAL AORTIC ANEURYSMS
description: Abdominal aortic aneurysms (AAA) are caused by a bloating of the abdominal aorta, your body’s largest artery. When you need care, we're here to help.

name: ALLERGIES
description: From a runny nose and cough to itchy eyes and headaches, ProMedica treats a variety of year-round allergy symptoms to help you breathe a little easier.

name: ALZHEIMER'S AND DEMENTIA
description: Progressive deterioration of memory, language difficulties and decision making problems are common symptoms and require medical and psychological care.

name: ANGIOGRAPHY
description: An angiogram is an X-ray that evaluates blocked blood vessels and arteries. The procedure helps vascular experts determine your best treatment options.

name: ANTICOAGULATION
description: Our anticoagulation service helps people taking blood thinners to safely and effectively manage their medication for the best chance of preventing blood clots.

name: ANXIETY IN CHILDREN
description: It can be difficult to help your child manage an anxiety disorder. You can count on our behavioral health experts for treatment and hope.

name: AORTIC SURGERY
description: The aorta delivers oxygenated blood from the heart to the body. If it ruptures, a cardiothoracic team can help diagnose and treat aortic heart disease.

name: AQUATIC THERAPY
description: Aquatic therapy is for people recovering from an injury, surgery or illness. It safely rebuilds your strength so you can get back to doing what you love.

name: ARRHYTHMIA
description: Arrhythmia is a common heart condition that causes an irregular heartbeat. Our electrophysiologists can diagnose and care for patients with an arrhythmia.

name: ASTHMA-ADULT
description: Asthma can make it hard to breath. Our specialists help you learn what triggers your symptoms and how to breathe easier by managing frequency and severity of symptoms.

name: ATRIAL FIBRILLATION (AFIB)
description:
AFib is the most common heart rhythm problem, and can be treated. Our AFib specialists are here to help with cutting-edge technology and cardiac
expertise.

name: ATTENTION DEFECIT HYPERACTIVITY DISORDER (ADHD)
description: ADHD is a common disorder that causes hyperactive, compulsive or unfocused behavior in kids. Our behavioral health experts can help children of all ages.

name: AUDIOLOGY
description: Our skilled audiology team can diagnose and treat hearing loss and other related voice disorders for people of all ages. If you’re having trouble hearing, let us help.

name: AUTISM
description: The ProMedica Finnegan Family Autism Center is here to offer support, resources and guidance to a loved one who is learning to live with autism.

name: AUTOMATED BREAST ULTRASOUND (ABUS)
description: ABUS creates 3D images of breast tissue to detect cancer. It may be used for women with dense breasts where masses may be missed with a standard mammogram.

name: BALANCE DISORDERS
description: If you experience dizziness or vertigo (a spinning feeling), you may have a balance disorder. Our vestibular rehab program supports your healing through exercise therapy.

name: BALLOON SINUPLASTY
description: Balloon sinuplasty, a procedure that widens your sinus passages using a small balloon device, can help you breathe better and ease sinus infections.

name: BARIATRIC SURGERY
description: Weight loss isn't just about looking great on the outside; it's about better health overall. Our experts help you know what to expect before, during and after surgery.

name: BEHAVIORAL HEALTH
description: With private, compassionate psychiatric and counseling services, we'll help you take control of your mental health and improve your wellbeing.

name: BIOREPOSITORY
description: Donating your blood and body tissue samples to ProMedica’s BioRepository can help researchers discover new treatments for cancer and other serious conditions.

name: BIPOLAR DISORDER
description: Bipolar disorder is a serious but treatable illness that causes extreme changes in mood, energy and behavior. Our mental health experts are here to help.

name: BLOOD AND BLEEDING DISORDERS
description: Blood and bleeding disorders, such as anemia, sickle cell disease and Von Willebrand's disease, affect how your blood functions and its ability to clot.

name: BLOOD MANAGEMENT
description: If you would prefer to avoid a blood transfusion during surgery, our progressive blood management program will do everything to help you avoid the possibility.

name: BRAIN ANEURYSMS
description: With a specialty brain aneurysm clinic that provides a range of testing, treatment options and follow-up care, we're positioned to help you when you need us most.

name: BRAIN CANCER
description: Our cancer team is here to support you through the challenges of brain tumor treatment. We use the latest technology to treat a wide variety of brain cancers.

name: BRAIN TUMORS
description: A brain tumor is a growth or mass of abnormal cells in the brain that could be cancerous. Learn more about therapies and surgeries available to help treat your tumor.

name: BREAST BIOPSY
description: Typically, for a breast biopsy, your doctor needs a small breast tissue sample that’s removed with a special biopsy needle. But ProMedica offers a less invasive image-guided option.

name: BREAST CANCER
description: Count on a team that's recognized as the region’s leading experts in breast cancer care for the most current research, advanced technology and best possible outcomes.

name: BREAST MRI
description: When paired with a traditional mammogram, a breast MRI can help your doctor gain a better understanding of your breast health.

name: CANCER
description: As part of the largest cancer program in the region, we’ll support your cancer journey with unmatched expertise, treatment options and support services.

name: CANCER REHABILITATION
description: Live life to the fullest after cancer with support from our cancer rehab program. We're here to empower survivors to live better and stronger as you recover.

name: CANCER SUPPORT AND SURVIVORSHIP
description: You don't have to face the challenges of cancer alone. We're here to help you with the physical and emotional changes, during and after treatment.

name: CARDIAC ARREST
description: When electrical impulses in your heart are abnormal, it can stop beating. Learn the risks and signs from our nationally recognized and accredited heart team.

name: CARDIAC REHABILITATION
description: After a heart issue, you want to return to normal. Our cardiac rehab program helps you get stronger and builds confidence so you can get back to your active life.

name: CARDIO-ONCOLOGY
description: Cancer treatment can be hard on your heart. ProMedica Cancer Institute’s cardio-oncology program can help lessen the effects of radiation and chemotherapy on the heart.

name: CARDIOTHORACIC SURGERY
description: ProMedica’s cardiothoracic surgeons are here to make sure you have access to the most advanced, state-of-the-art technology and surgical techniques to treat heart disease.

name: CAROTID ARTERY DISEASE
description: Carotid artery disease is a common cause of stroke. Our expert vascular surgeons can help diagnose and treat CAD and keep your arteries healthy.

name: CERVICAL CANCER
description: Access to the most current research and technology in cervical cancer screening and treatment helps you achieve your best possible outcome.

name: CHEMOTHERAPY
description: Chemotherapy uses medications to treat cancer, keep it from spreading, slow growth or relieve symptoms. We're ready to help with a variety of chemotherapy options to treat your cancer.

name: CHILD LIFE
description: At ProMedica Russell J. Ebeid Children’s Hospital, we help children adjust to our hospital environment, and help families cope with the emotional impact of illness.

name: CHILDREN'S CANCER
description: Cancers that affect children are different from cancers that affect adults. Our care team offers specialized treatment.

name: CHROMOSOMAL ABNORMALITIES
description: Genetic testing searches for chromosome abnormalities, which are cell issues in babies that can be inherited from a parent or that happen with no prior family history.

name: CHRONIC OBSTRUCTIVE PULMONARY DISEASE
description: Our Pulmonary Clinic can diagnose and treat COPD, a group of lung diseases that get worse over time and cause severe breathing and coughing issues.

name: COLORECTAL CANCER
description: Our specialists are highly experienced in finding colorectal cancer early and combining innovative care with a personalized approach.

name: COLORECTAL SURGERY
description: Our experts treat a variety of disorders involving the colon, rectum and anus. Advanced robotic techniques may be used for minimal scarring and complications.

name: CONTACT DERMATITIS
description: Find relief from red, itchy rashes caused by an allergic reaction. Our dermatologists can help.

name: CT SCAN (COMPUTED TOMOGRAPHY)
description: Through computed tomography, or CAT scans, our radioligist can see the condition of your bones and body’s soft tissues.

name: CYSTIC FIBROSIS
description: Cystic Fibrosis causes the body to create a sticky mucous that clogs the lungs and makes it hard to breathe. The Cystic Fibrosis Center of Northwest Ohio can help.

name: DEEP VEIN THROMBOSIS (DVT)
description: DVT blood clots are deep blot clot that break and release into your bloodstream. Our vascular surgeons treat these dangerous blood clots with skill and compassion.

name: DEPRESSION
description: Everyone feels down sometimes. If your blues are constant, and keep you from doing the things you love, turn to our behavioral health experts for help.

name: DEXA SCAN (BONE DENSITY TEST)
description: A bone scan can quickly find the source of bone pain or swelling. Early detection is the key to preventing fractures or the spread of disease and infection.

name: DIABETES
description: Don’t just manage your diabetes. Take control of it. We provide treatment and guidance to help you live your healthiest life.

name: DIABETIC RETINOPATHY
description: Diabetic retinopathy is a leading cause of blindness in adults. Though not preventable, eye care experts can help lower your risk and ease symptoms.

name: EAR, NOSE AND THROAT
description: Ear, nose and throat issues are nothing to sneeze at. With ENT specialists available throughout the area, we'll diagnose and treat your condition to help you find relief.

name: ECZEMA
description: Inflamed skin and an itchy rash may be symptoms of eczema. Our dermatologists can provide relief for this common condition.

name: ELECTROPHYSIOLOGY
description: Electrophysiologists are specialty trained cardiologists who treat abnormal or irregular heart rhythms in our state-of-the-art Heart Rhythm Center.

name: EMERGENCY CARE
description: When you have an emergency, you need care fast. That's why our emergency care team is specially trained to give you the immediate, round-the-clock care you need.

name: ENDOSCOPY
description: Endoscopic procedures examine the colon, esophagus, lungs, stomach, small intestine or pancreas for causes of pain and discomfort.

name: EYE CARE - ADULT
description: We offer comprehensive eye care, from eye exams to glasses and contact lenses to eye disorder treatment.

name: EYE CARE - CHILDREN
description: Kids need regular eye care, too. Our specialists make sure that your child's eyes are healthy and detect and correct eye problems in their early stages.

name: FAMILY MEDICINE
description: Our family medicine physicians treat the overall health and wellness of every member of your family, including infants, children and adults of all ages.

name: FITNESS
description: Fitness programs help you get in shape and feel better. Our trainers, specialists and nutritionists can guide your journey to a healthier you.

name: GASTROINTESTINAL (GI) CANCER
description: Our skilled and compassionate cancer team treats cancers of the GI tract and digestive organs.

name: GENERAL SURGERY
description: Our board-certified surgeons perform thousands of procedures every year. If you need surgery, count on us for expert, compassionate care.

name: GENETIC TESTING /COUNSELING
description: Some genetic mutations may raise your risk for cancer. Our genetic counselors are here to help you understand your genetics and your risks.

name: GENITOURINARY (GU) CANCER
description: Our oncology experts can safely treat genitourinary (GU) cancer, which can include kidney (renal), bladder, prostate, penis and testicular cancers.

name: GYNECOLOGIC SURGERY
description: From endometriosis to incontinence, our women’s health experts offer surgical options that meet your needs at every stage of life.

name: GYNECOLOGY
description: Our women's health experts are available for screenings, routine exams and other specialized gynecologic care.

name: HEAD AND NECK CANCER
description: Head and neck cancers are often caused by factors you can't control. Know your risk, which increases with age.

name: HEART ATTACK
description: A heart attack happens when heart muscles are damaged by a lack of blood. When the worst happens, you need leading-edge care for this life-threatening emergency.

name: HEART CARE
description: When it comes to heart care, you want a team with proven expertise and outcomes. Get the treatment and continual care you need to keep your heart beating strong.

name: HEART DISEASE
description: Diabetes, high blood pressure or high cholesterol can lead to heart disease. If you have a heart issue, seek immediate medical care from an expert cardiovascular team.

name: HEART FAILURE
description: Heart failure happens when your heart can’t pump enough blood for your body. Our heart experts offer leading-edge cardiovascular care to keep your heart healthy.

name: HEART SURGERY
description: From minimally invasive to traditional open procedures, we offer a full range of surgical services for your heart condition.

name: HEMATOLOGIC CANCER
description: Hematologic cancer includes cancers from blood (leukemia), lymphatic system (lymphoma) and bone marrow (myeloma). Our cancer center offers leading edge treatments.

name: HEMOPHILIA
description: Hemophilia is a disorder that causes uncontrollable bleeding. Our Northwest Ohio Hemophilia Treatment Center diagnoses and treats genetic bleeding disorders.

name: HERNIA
description: A hernia is a part of the intestine that pushes through abdominal muscles, creating a lump under the skin. Our hernia program offers easy access to hernia repair.

name: HIGH BLOOD PRESSURE (HYPERTENSION)
description: High blood pressure (hypertension) makes your heart work harder than it has to and leads to a number of related health issues. Take control of your condition with ongoing care.

name: HIGH CHOLESTEROL
description: Too much cholesterol in your blood can be dangerous and lead to other health issues. We'll help you keep it in check and lower your risk for heart disease.

name: HIP REPLACEMENT
description: Hip pain can keep you from living an active life. Find relief with help from our orthopaedic specialists and get back to the activities you enjoy.

name: HIVES
description: Hives cause red, raised bumps on the skin due to an allergic reaction or viral infection. Our specialists can determine the cause and treat the itchy symptoms.

name: HYPERBARIC MEDICINE
description: Infected and slow-healing wounds call for state-of-the-art hyperbaric care. When traditional treatment isn't working, hyperbaric pure oxygen therapy can help.

name: INFANT MONITOR PROGRAM
description: High-risk infants need diagnostic, therapeutic and educational support to grow. We support families who need home monitoring services to keep babies healthy.

name: INTERNAL MEDICINE
description: Internal medicine specialists provide a comprehensive array of health services, including diagnosis, treatment and wellness care to adults over 18.

name: KNEE REPLACEMENT
description: You don’t have to live with chronic knee pain. Let our knee replacement experts get you back to an active, pain-free life.

name: LABORATORIES AND PATHOLOGY
description: Using the latest in advanced testing, our laboratories provide high-quality testing as quickly as possible.

name: LEUKEMIA
description: Leukemia is a blood and bone marrow cancer usually caused by a rise in white blood cells that don't work correctly. Our experts are here with personalized treatment.

name: LIVER CANCER
description: If cancer enters your liver (a large, critical organ), early diagnosis and treatment is essential. ProMedica oncologists are here when and where you need them.

name: LUNG CANCER
description: Chest pain, a persistent cough or trouble swallowing may be signs of lung cancer. We offer the region's most advanced treatment options to help you breathe easier during your cancer journey.

name: LYMPHEDEMA THERAPY
description: Lymphedema is swelling caused by damaged lymph nodes, usually as a result of cancer treatment. Our Total Rehab program offers therapies to help.

name: LYMPHOMA
description: Lymphoma is a cancer of the lymph nodes, part of the body's immune system. Our hematologists and oncologists

name: MAMMOGRAPHY
description: Early detection is the key to breast health. That’s why we offer state-of-the-art digital mammography to give a clearer picture during your screenings.

name: MATERNITY
description: You want a happy, healthy baby. Our maternity experts are ready to care for you during and after your pregnancy, as well as helping you prepare for the big day.

name: MIDWIFERY
description: Our certified nurse midwives provide a wide range of women’s care services. From pregnancy and childbirth to adolescence and menopause, they're here to help.

name: MIGRAINE HEADACHES
description: From maintenance drugs to prevent their onset to medications to stop migraines in their tracks, we're here to help when headache pain disrupts your life.

name: MATERNAL-FETAL MEDICINE (HIGH-RISK PREGNANCY)
description: If you or your baby are considered high-risk, you can get expert, compassionate care from our multi-disciplinary team of maternal-fetal medicine specialists.

name: MENOPAUSE
description: Menopause is a natural part of the aging process, but its side effects can be challenging. Our midlife care team is here to lend support and ease your symptoms.

name: MOLECULAR BREAST IMAGING
description: Some women have dense breast tissue. That’s why our women’s health experts offer molecular breast imaging (MBI) to get a more accurate reading.

name: MRI (MAGNETIC RESONANCE IMAGING)
description: An MRI can be needed to diagnose a disease or check on your progress during treatment. Using state-of-the-art technology, our radiologists capture high-resolution images.

name: MULTIPLE SCLEROSIS
description: MS is a disease that causes your immune system to attack your nerves, disrupting communication from your brain to your body. We can help you control your symptoms.

name: NEONATAL INTENSIVE CARE UNIT (NICU)
description: When your newborn needs immediate, critical care, the Neonatal Intensive Care Unit at the ProMedica Russell J. Ebeid Children's Hospital can help.

name: NEURO CANCER
description: Did you know neuro cancer can affect both the brain and spine at the same time? Our neurological team offers a variety of treatment options.

name: NEUROLOGIC REHABILITATION
description: We create personalized care plans to address the physical, emotional and psychological needs of those recovering from injuries of the central nervous system.

name: NEUROSCIENCES
description: Our award-winning ProMedica Neurosciences Institute team combines academics, research, prevention, screening and treatment to give you access to leading-edge care.

name: NEUROSURGERY
description: Our neurosurgeons offer quality care and expertise in the diagnosis and surgical treatment of a wide variety of brain and spine conditions.

name: NUCLEAR MEDICINE
description: Using nuclear medicine, our radiologists help determine how an organ is functioning by using a chemical that’s gently injected into your body.

name: NUTRITION COUNSELING
description: Nutrition counseling provides one-on-one time with a registered dietitian to help you develop a plan for success so you can reach your nutritional goals.

name: OBSESSIVE COMPULSIVE DISORDER (OCD)
description: Our behavioral health experts offer compassionate treatment for OCD, a condition of anxiety-producing thoughts that cause intense, repetitive behaviors.

name: OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH
description: Occupational health works with employers to create safe, comfortable environments. Options are available to meet the health care needs of all types of businesses.

name: OCCUPATIONAL THERAPY
description: Through our Total Rehab Program, our licensed occupational therapists can help you regain the skills and strength you need to get back to doing what you love.

name: ONDEMAND
description: Visit with a board-certified healthcare provider anytime using a mobile device or computer, even if you aren't a ProMedica patient.

name: OPHTHALMOLOGY
description: Our eye care specialists provide medical and surgical care for your eyes, including eye conditions caused by diabetes, hypertension and other diseases.

name: OPTOMETRY
description: Optometrists provide primary eye care, checking for changes in vision and prescribing glasses or contact lenses. They also treat eye diseases such as glaucoma.

name: ORTHOPAEDIC SURGERY
description: Some injuries may need a surgical procedure to help you get moving again. Discover state-of-the-art options to help relieve your pain.

name: ORTHOPAEDICS
description: Don’t let pain stop you from doing what you love. Our ProMedica Orthopaedics Institute specialists will create a plan to get you back to your life.

name: OSTEOARTHRITIS
description: When the cartilage in a joint is damaged or gone completely, moving is painful. Discover a variety of treatment options to ease your suffering from osteoarthritis.

name: OSTEOPOROSIS
description: Osteoporosis is a thinning of bone tissue and loss of bone density that happens mostly in women. Bone density screenings can help detect osteoporosis early.

name: PAIN MANAGEMENT
description: When you’re in pain, all you want is relief. That's why our pain management programs are designed to help you control your pain and start living your life again.

name: PARKINSON'S DISEASE
description: Parkinson's disease is a chronic and progressive disease of the central nervous system. Comprehensive rehabilitation programs can help you improve your motor skills.

name: PEDIATRIC ASTHMA
description: Our ProMedica’s Pediatric Pulmonary Clinic meets the highest national standards for quality and safety in asthma diagnosis, treatment and education.

name: PEDIATRIC GASTROENTEROLOGY
description: For digestive disorders, ProMedica Russell J. Ebeid Children’s Hospital offers a full range of inpatient and outpatient services, diagnostic procedures and treatments.

name: PEDIATRIC HEMATOLOGY/ONCOLOGY
description: The pediatric specialists at ProMedica diagnose and treat a variety of blood diseases (hematology) and cancers (oncology) in children of all ages.

name: PEDIATRIC OPHTHALMOLOGY
description: Pediatric eye care specialists provide vision care and diagnose and treat eye diseases in children.

name: PEDIATRIC ORTHOPAEDICS
description: Our pediatric orthopaedic experts understand the unique needs of children who have bone and joint conditions. We diagnose and treat a variety of injuries and deformities.

name: PEDIATRIC PSYCHIATRY
description: Children and adolescents have specific mental and behavioral health needs. Our programs and specialists are specially trained to engage — and listen to — your child.

name: PEDIATRIC REHABILITATION
description: Our speech, occupational and physical therapists work under the direction of a pediatric physiatrist to provide expert care for growing children.

name: PEDIATRICS
description: Our compassionate pediatric team cares about the health of all children. We'll never stop working to keep your child growing strong, now and into the future.

name: PELVIC CONGESTION SYNDROME
description: We offer compassionate treatment for pelvic congestion syndrome, which causes chronic pelvic pain in women.

name: PELVIC FLOOR DISORDERS
description: A weak pelvic floor can cause a variety of disruptive symptoms. Our fellowship-trained specialists have the most experience in the region.

name: PELVIC FLOOR PHYSICAL THERAPY
description: Our team offers pelvic floor physical therapy as a non-surgical treatment for severe pelvic pain to rebuild the strength, motor control and endurance of pelvic muscles.

name: PELVIC HEALTH
description: Your pelvic region includes your bladder, rectum and reproductive organs. When something is wrong, it causes pain and incontinence. We're here to help.

name: PELVIC PAIN
description: Chronic pelvic pain takes a toll physically and mentally. Pelvic health experts pinpoint the cause and craft a treatment plan to help you feel healthy and strong.

name: PERIPHERAL ARTERY DISEASE (PAD)
description: Peripheral artery disease (PAD) causes pain when narrowed arteries reduce blood flow to your legs. Our vascular experts can guide your healing and get you moving again.

name: PHYSICAL THERAPY
description: Our licensed physical therapists can treat problems that interfere with your ability to move naturally and perform normal daily activities.

name: PLASTIC AND RECONSTRUCTIVE SURGERY
description: Look and feel your best with reconstructive and cosmetic procedures performed by expert and compassionate plastic and reconstructive surgeons.

name: PODIATRY
description: If pain is holding you back, get back on your feet again with help from foot care specialists. We treat a wide variety of problematic foot and ankle conditions.

name: POSITRON EMISSION TOMOGRAPHY
description: Our radiologists offer state-of-the-art PET scans to help doctors see organs and tissues in the brain, heart, lungs and breasts using a special dye.

name: POST-TRAUMATIC STRESS DISORDER
description: If you or a loved one are coping with memories of a terrifying event, our mental health experts can help diagnose and treat your PTSD with care and compassion.

name: POSTPARTUM DEPRESSION
description: Postpartum depression is a common mental condition following the birth of a child. Our caring team is here to help.

name: PRIMARY CARE
description: Your primary care provider is your main advocate in your day-to-day health. ProMedica Physicians is here to help you with prevention and manage health conditions.

name: PROSTATE CANCER
description: As the second-leading cause of cancer death in men, prostate cancer requires advanced technology and treatment options to improve outcomes.

name: PSYCHIATRY
description: Our psychiatric team is devoted to the diagnosis, prevention and treatment of mental illness, emotional disturbance and behavior disorders.

name: PULMONARY EMBOLISM
description: A pulmonary embolism occurs when one or more arteries in your lungs become blocked by a blood clot. The specialists at Jobst Vascular Institute can help.

name: RADIOLOGY
description: When you need diagnostic imaging to get a clearer picture of your health, we offer board-certified radiologists and state-of-the- art technology at 30 locations.

name: ROBOTIC EXOSKELETON THERAPY AND REHAB
description: ProMedica offers the EksoGT,™ the first-ever FDA approved, wearable robotic exoskeleton to help stroke and spinal cord patients stand up and walk again.

name: REGENERATIVE MEDICINE
description: Regenerative medicine uses your own cells to heal your pain and get you moving again, without surgery.

name: REHABILITATION AND THERAPY
description: If you’re recovering from an injury, illness or surgery, we're here to help you regain the skills and strength you need to get back to your active lifestyle.

name: RADIATION THERAPY
description: Radiation therapy is high-energy, therapeutic X-rays that can help prevent cancer cells from growing and multiplying.

name: RHEUMATOLOGY
description: If you have arthritis, our specialists can treat a wide range of rheumatic diseases that cause pain in your joints, muscles, bones, skin and tissues.

name: RESPIRATORY / PULMONARY CARE
description: If you tire easily or struggle to breathe, our expert clinicians are here to help with treatment options for a variety of breathing and respiratory issues.

name: SINUS CONDITIONS
description: Never let sinus issues keep you from doing what you love. Let our ear, nose and throat specialists diagnose and treat your condition so you can breathe easier.

name: SICKLE CELL DISEASE
description: If you have sickle cell disease, you need comprehensive treatment, pain management and transfusions. The caring team at our Pediatric and Adult Sickle Cell Clinics can help.

name: SKIN CANCER
description: Typically caused by sun exposure, skin cancer is the most common cancer. It requires expert treatment from a specially trained team.

name: SLEEP MEDICINE
description: If you struggle to get a good night’s sleep, our sleep experts can help with a variety of different treatment options to help you rest easy again.

name: SPINE CARE
description: Our comprehensive approach includes a spine care clinic, connected to neurosciences experts and orthopaedic specialists, to give you options in finding relief.

name: SPEECH THERAPY
description: If you have a medical issue that affects your speech, our Total Rehab Program offers a variety of therapies, including speech and language pathology, to help.

name: SKIN CARE
description: Love the skin you're in with help from skin care experts who offer everything from facials to peels to injections. You'll leave happier and more confident.

name: SPORTS MEDICINE
description: From sports-related injuries and tendonitis to joint pain and arthritis, our sports medicine experts can help keep you in the game.

name: STRUCTURAL HEART DISEASE
description: Structural heart disease experts treat a variety of conditions inside your heart, including damage and flaws in your heart’s valves, walls and chambers.

name: STROKE
description: At hospitals and outpatient clinics throughout our region, our stroke experts in our award-winning program are committed to exceptional outcomes.

name: SURGICAL SERVICES
description: If you need surgery, our board-certified surgeons are here to help. We perform about 60,000 general and specialty surgeries each year for a wide range of conditions.

name: SEIZURES AND EPILEPSY
description: Epilepsy is a nervous system disorder that can cause seizures. Though there’s no cure, there are a number of treatment options for controlling and eliminating seizures.

name: SHOULDER REPLACEMENT
description: Don’t let shoulder pain keep you from being active. Our orthopaedic surgeons can replace your shoulder with a new, artificial joint to restore your movement.

name: TELEPHONE VISIT
description: Telemedicine gives you access to a wide range of providers and specialists, from the comfort of your office or home.

name: THORACIC SURGERY
description: Using the most advanced methods, our cardiothoracic surgeons specializei n minimally invasive thoracic procedures to treat the lungs, chest wall, trachea and esophagus.

name: TOBACCO CESSATION
description: Are you ready to quit smoking for good? We can help. Our smoking cessation program can equip you with the tools, information and support you need for success.

name: URGENT CARE
description: Urgent care is open to patients of all ages who need immediate, nonemergency medical care. We have urgent care locations throughout greater Toledo, and one just for kids

name: UROLOGY
description: Our urologists provide care for male and female conditions, like kidney stones, cancer, vasectomies, urinary tract infections, bladder issues and more.

name: URINARY TRACT INFECTION
description: Urinary tract infections (UTIs) are infections that make it painful to urinate. We help thousands of patients each year with safe, effective UTI treatments.

name: URINARY INCONTINENCE
description: A loss of bladder control can happen at any age, and can be managed with treatments ranging from lifestyle changes to surgery.

name: ULTRASOUND
description: Ultrasound uses sound waves to create pictures of the inside of your body to help your doctors form an accurate diagnosis and plan effective treatment.

name: VALVE SURGERY
description: Our cardiothoracic surgeons repair and replace heart vales using minimally invasive techniques and open-heart surgery.

name: VASCULAR DISEASE
description: Vascular disease is when blood vessels carrying blood to and from your heart get blocked. But medical treatment and lifestyle changes can help improve your health.

name: VASCULAR LAB
description: Vascular labs help your doctor understand what’s going on with your circulatory system. Jobst Vascular Institute performs more than 30,000 of these studies each year.

name: VARICOSE AND SPIDER VEINS
description: Don’t let varicose and spider veins make you self-conscious or uncomfortable. Minimally invasive treatments can help you feel confident and comfortable again.

name: VASCULAR CARE
description: Jobst Vascular Institute brings you world-class care close to home. We offer a innovative and personal approach to testing, medical treatment and surgery.

name: VASCULAR SURGERY
description: Our vascular surgeons provide the surgical treatment of disease in your circulatory system outside of your heart and brain, including the arteries and veins.

name: VASCULAR NEUROLOGY
description: Vascular neurology is a specialized treatment of strokes and its risk factors. ProMedica provides care in a state-of-the-art stroke unit with a neuro-interventional lab.

name: VASECTOMY
description: Through a common outpatient procedure called vasectomy, we help men who want permanent birth control.

name: VENOUS SCLEROTHERAPY
description: Venous sclerotherapy is a minimally invasive treatment option used to improve the appearance of varicose and spider veins.

name: VIDEO VISIT
description: Your ProMedica Physician may offer a scheduled video visit through your mobile device or computer.

name: VEIN CARE
description: Say goodbye to unsightly varicose veins and hello to healthier-looking legs with help from our vein care team. We'll restore your confidence and help you feel better.

name: WEIGHT LOSS
description: If your weight is holding you back, it’s time for a lasting change. Our weight loss experts provide programs and the support you need to help you reach your goals.

name: WOMEN'S HEALTH
description: From breast care and gynecologic services to midlife care and pelvic health, we're passionate about women's health and are here for every stage of your life.

name: WOUND CARE
description: If you have a cut, incision or other injury that isn't healing as quickly as it should, you need wound experts to help you heal.

name: X-RAY
description: General radiology services (diagnostic X-rays) help your doctors identify disease or injury inside your body using radiation to produce an image on a special film.
